name: My Pets: Maze
description:
Choose your favorite Pet and test your intelligence in a simple and fun maze game.
Take the pencil and draw the best way to solve the maze.

Maze game where you choose a Pet and draw the correct path to solve the maze in each level.

Key Features:

  • All levels depict a different theme related to your Pet
  • Stylized graphics (made by a children's comic artist)
  • Relaxing soundtrack
  • Made for computer
